title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 452 of 2020), hereby
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Withholding of
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Withholding of 
Information on Offences against Children and Vulnerable Persons) Act 2012 
(Prescribed Organisations and Prescribed Persons) Order 2025. 

(2) This Order shall come into operation on 30 May 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited criminal justice (withholding information offence child vulnerable persons) act 2012 (prescribed organisation prescribed persons) order 2025 (2) order shall come operation 30 may 2025

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 452 of 2020), hereby

text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “Act of 2012” means the Criminal Justice (Withholding of 
Information on Offences Against Children and Vulnerable Persons) Act 2012 
(No. 24 of 2012).

3. The Health Service Executive is prescribed for the purposes of section 4

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 452 of 2020), hereby
heading: 4. Each of the classes of persons specified in the Schedule employed or
text_raw:
4. Each of the classes of persons specified in the Schedule employed or 
otherwise engaged by the Health Service Executive is prescribed for the 
purposes of section 4 of the Act of 2012. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 30th May, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [224] 3
text_norm: 4 class person specified schedule employed otherwise engaged health service executive prescribed purpose section 4 act 2012 notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 30th may 2025 224 3

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 452 of 2020), hereby
heading: Classes of Persons
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Classes of Persons 

(a) Directors of Counselling (National Counselling Service) 

(b) Counsellor Therapist, Seniors, National Counselling Service 

(c) Counsellor/Therapists (National Counselling Service) 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 May, 2025. 

JIM O’CALLAGHAN, 
Minister for Justice.
